description:
Updated on 29 May 2016( Added lectures on RPVST+ ) - FOURTH UPDATE

Cisco Nexus- The most popular, Demanding and Critical Hardware being used in Worldwide Datacenters.

When I launched my earlier courses- I was asked by students to prepare course on Cisco Nexus as this was not available in market. After spending over a month on Real Cisco Nexus 7000 and 5000 devices- This course is Ready for all of you and Note one thing- You will keep on getting new and updated lectures in this course- ONLY when you are subscribed to it.

All of my Labs have been implemented and Configured on Real Cisco Nexus 7010 and 5K Devices.

I would say it is just the beginning of my courses in this most robust Cisco Nexus Devices.

I am pretty certain that you will NOT get this kind of advanced course anywhere - that too at this unbelievable price ( Never Before ! )

Most of you must be working on DC environments where you will probably have Nexus Devices- But problem that we get is no experience on these critical devices. Now, you will get all commands , features and detailed explanation which will make you a Nexus Professional Engineer.
title: Learn Cisco Nexus Configuration and Implementation
